name: Africa: Tapping the continent's talent - Panel
description: The video discusses the idea of building new cities in Africa to attract talent and create opportunities for people to connect with global businesses without having to move countries. The speaker emphasizes the importance of government relations and integration across African countries to make it easier for entrepreneurs to scale their businesses. The video also touches on the potential for startups to emerge that deal with governance issues across the 54 African countries. Finally, the speaker addresses the question of what it would take to get people to come back to Africa.
